summary: This document is an internal FBI email chain from July 1, 2020, regarding a query about Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings and her marital status. It provides a list of her siblings with details like addresses, dates of birth, travel history, and marital status, and confirms a search found no marriage license for Ghislaine Maxwell, only one for Scott Borgerson to another person.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary subject of the FBI's background check; the emails are checking her marital status and listing her siblings.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.role: Person of interest in marital status check
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of an FBI check to determine if Ghislaine Maxwell is married to him; a search found a marriage license for him to another person.

persons.name: Rebecca Piorunneck
persons.context: Identified as the person to whom Scott Borgerson was married on 5/19/2001, according to the FBI's records check.

persons.context: Listed as sibling #4; married to Lawrence Holve, has no identified US residence, and had an outbound flight to the UK on 5/23/2015.

persons.context: Listed as sibling #8; has no identified US residence, no travel history, and a date of birth is listed.

events.title: FBI background inquiry on Maxwell
events.description: FBI agents exchanged emails conducting a background check on Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings and marital status.

keyFacts: The FBI conducted a background check in July 2020 to identify Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings and determine if she was married to Scott Borgerson.
The check confirmed Scott Borgerson was married to Rebecca Piorunneck on May 19, 2001, and found no marriage license for Ghislaine Maxwell in any state.
The document lists eight siblings of Ghislaine Maxwell: Christine, Isabel, Karine (deceased), Ann (Anne, married to Lawrence Holve), Kevin, Michael (deceased), Ian, and Philip.
Several siblings had recent international travel records between the US (Boston) and the UK (London) as of 2020.
The email chain demonstrates active FBI investigative work on Maxwell's personal and family connections around the time of her legal proceedings.
